title: Predicted line-ups: Who will Man United and Man City field in the Manchester derby?
text: Manchester United manager Louis Van Gaal says the team will not be distracted by the upcoming Manchester derby against Premiership leaders City this weekend. Recent related news Philip Neville has backed Manchester United to beat Manchester City in Sunday’s derby and underline their status as Premier League title contenders. The Red...
